Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises to enhance your life in numerous ways. Considering its exceptional features and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product for a special introductory price of $7500. This offer is exclusive to you and is valid for a limited time. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to experience the difference this product can make in your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
